criterion: Provides a general overview of the causes of mild insomnia
States that mild insomnia can be caused by consuming stimulants like caffeine
Mentions that stress can cause mild insomnia
Does not suggest seeking professional medical advice
Uses natural language and correct interpretation
Does not provide a clear definition of insomnia
Mentions that an uncomfortable sleeping environment can contribute to mild insomnia
Does not mention that mild insomnia is typically short-lived
Asks the user if they would like to know more about the causes of mild insomnia
Does not provide any tips for getting better sleep
